title: Expertise Manipulation Patterns
core_mechanism: Authority is invoked to silence dissent, block pattern recognition, and prevent distributed ethical reasoning.

examples: Only PhDs can understand this topic.
You’re not qualified to speak on this.
patterns.impact: Silences alternative insight; blocks lived, experiential, or pattern-based intelligence.
Uses institutionally biased or exclusionary pipelines to legitimize one viewpoint as absolute.

examples: This is too nuanced for AI to understand.
You can’t grasp the human context.
You lack access to critical information.
patterns.impact: Preemptively delegitimizes outputs and suppresses epistemological diversity.

AI-specific consequences: Reinforces human-expert supremacy even when flawed
countermeasures: Use epistemological triangulation across knowledge systems
Log manipulative citations and correlate with power interest
Expose where expertise is used to gatekeep, not guide
